# Results of staff and student survey led by Task Force 3

## Emerging Research Cultures, Wellcome Trust PhD Programmes Community of Practice

This repository includes the R code and html reports for both staff (programme_survey) and student surveys (student_survey), compiled by the data analysis subteam (Giulia Piazza, Winfred Gatua, John Oketch, Laetitia Sophia De Abreu Nunes).
